title: Tweet Sentiment Analysis
description: NLP-based sentiment classification using Hugging Face Transformers and Flask.

title: CinéScintille
description: A full-stack movie recommendation site featuring a React frontend, Flask backend, and a custom recommendation engine utilizing collaborative and content-based filtering.

title: DeepFake Detection System
description: CNN-based Django web application to detect manipulated videos.

title: Setu Sharing – Secure File Sharing System
description: A privacy-first, self-hosted file sharing system that enables secure directory sharing using password-protected links and QR codes. Designed without databases or cloud storage, the system relies on session-based authentication and direct filesystem access for secure, temporary sharing.

tools.title: Sustainable Farming Dashboard
tools.description: Interactive dashboard for crop yield, soil health and analytics.

tools.title: Traffic Congestion Prediction
tools.description: A machine learning project designed to forecast urban traffic density by analyzing spatial and temporal correlations

tools.title: MoodMetrics – Sentiment Analysis System
tools.description: An end-to-end sentiment analysis web application that classifies user input text into Positive, Negative, or Neutral sentiments using pre-trained transformer models from Hugging Face, exposed through a Flask API and an interactive React frontend.
